name: Interstellar Sex Police
description:
Interstellar Sex Police is a space shooter with time manipulation mechanics and a sense of humor.

I think its easiest to make a list of things my game has.

A LIST OF THINGS IN INTERSTELLAR SEX POLICE

. It has builds available for free on PC, MAC, LINUX, and more if you donate on any of my itch.io game pages, so I can buy a license for mobile. Please do.

. It has gamepad support, so plug your xbox360 controller in!

. It has a rad soundtrack done by a friend of mine

. It has explosions!!! EXPLOSIONS!!!

so play it.
